body_html:
this is a NVCC 7.5 bug. I tried various versions of gcc with nvcc in a CENTOS6 env, and it wasn't fixed. The only workaround is to fix gloo or update nvcc to 8.0 or greater.
I fixed gloo in the current subtree, the error should not happen right now.
Fixed via: facebookincubator/gloo#107

body:
this is a NVCC 7.5 bug. I tried various versions of gcc with nvcc in a CENTOS6 env, and it wasn't fixed. The only workaround is to fix gloo or update nvcc to 8.0 or greater.
I fixed gloo in the current subtree, the error should not happen right now.
Fixed via: https://github.com/facebookincubator/gloo/pull/107
